info.author: David Little
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

A simple two-column blog-style theme for Plone 3x based on Simplicity by GGG
Design: http://www.oswd.org/design/preview/id/3590.

Theme developed by David Little, david@littled.net.

This is completely CSS based and theme has its own main_template in
skins/plonetheme_simplicity_templates. The main_template and associated CSS and
Javascripts have been copied from the Plone Tableless theme by Simon Kaeser:
http://plone.org/products/plone-tableless.


Installation
============

See docs/install.txt for installation instructions.


Customising
===========

You can replace the theme's "splash" image by uploading your own to the root of
your Plone site or placing it in the portal_skins/custom directory within the
ZMI. It should be 750 pixels (width) by 250 pixels (height).



Changelog
=========

0.1 - Unreleased
----------------

* Initial release
info.name: plonetheme.simplicity
info.html_description:
Introduction

A simple two-column blog-style theme for Plone 3x based on Simplicity by GGG Design: http://www.oswd.org/design/preview/id/3590.

Theme developed by David Little, david@littled.net.

This is completely CSS based and theme has its own main_template in skins/plonetheme_simplicity_templates. The main_template and associated CSS and Javascripts have been copied from the Plone Tableless theme by Simon Kaeser: http://plone.org/products/plone-tableless.

Installation

See docs/install.txt for installation instructions.

Customising

You can replace the theme’s “splash” image by uploading your own to the root of your Plone site or placing it in the portal_skins/custom directory within the ZMI. It should be 750 pixels (width) by 250 pixels (height).

Changelog

0.1 - Unreleased

  • Initial release
